LanguageData.DMS_FlashLauncher.label: Flashbang barrage
LanguageData.DMS_FlashLauncher.description: Launch an indirect-fired flashbang to stun the enemy.
LanguageData.DMS_LongJump.label: Bionic Longjump
LanguageData.DMS_LongJump.description: Jump to a distant location using bionic muscles.
LanguageData.DMS_LongJump.verbProperties.label: jump
LanguageData.DMS_MissileLauncher.label: Launch Missile
LanguageData.DMS_MissileLauncher.description: Launch a long range guided missile with a high explosive payload.
LanguageData.DMS_NuclearOverload.label: Fission Overload
LanguageData.DMS_NuclearOverload.description:
In order to avoid catastrophic environmental pollution or capture by the enemy, the fission battery can be manually forced into a meltdown.
A meltdown will cause all unreacted nuclear material to atomize instantl, causing a violent explosive reaction.
LanguageData.DMS_NuclearOverload.confirmationDialogTe:
Overloading the fission battery will create a devastating explosion and destroy this unit.
Are you sure to do this?
LanguageData.DMS_NuclearOverload.verbProperties.label: fission overload
LanguageData.DMS_RepairMode.label: Self-Repair
LanguageData.DMS_RepairMode.description: Initialize self-repair mode to rebuild missing parts, all sensors will temporarily be disabled to prevent electrical damage.
LanguageData.DMS_RepairMode.verbProperties.label: initialize self-repair mode
LanguageData.DMS_SmokeLauncher.label: Particle Smoke Barrage
LanguageData.DMS_SmokeLauncher.description: Launch an antiparticle smoke screen to interfere with incoming charged munitions.
LanguageData.DMS_Strafing.label: strafing
LanguageData.DMS_Strafing.description: Concentrate firepower to conduct a strafing attack in a specific direction.
